item.title: Version 1.9.2
item.description:
Changes

  • Updated Oculus SDK to version 1.43
  • SteamVR Input should now be configurable before running an app

Bug fixes

  • Revive: Fixed Stormland crashing on launch and rendering differently in each eye (#1379)
    • Special thanks to @CircuitLord and @fholger
  • ReviveXR: Numerous fixes thanks to @qlyoung
